duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide professional counseling and clinical expertise to individuals, couples, and teens.
Engage with clients to understand their mental health concerns and guide them towards wellness and recovery.
Participate in continuing education to stay updated on best practices and treatment modalities.
Maintain client engagement and build a strong therapeutic alliance to support clients through their mental health journey.
Ensure privacy and confidentiality in all communications and adhere to ethical and legal standards in therapy sessions.
Utilize telehealth communication methods to conduct remote therapy sessions effectively and securely.
Understand and manage insurance and liability requirements related to therapy practice.

education_certification.credential: Full licensure by a State Board to provide counseling independently (e.g., LCSW, LPC, LMFT, PsyD)
